name: Delighted Survey Plugin
author: The Brihaspati Infotech

sections.description:
Delighted’s WooCommerce plugin automatically sends surveys to customers after their orders are marked as Completed.

The surveys can be sent immediately after an order is marked as Completed, or delayed by an amount of your choosing to account for delivery time.
sections.faq:
What delay options are available for the survey send ?

The delay refers to the time between when an order is marked as Completed in WooCommerce and when a Delighted survey is sent to the customer. The delay options include:

Instantly (no delay)
1 day
1 week
2 weeks
1 month

What properties are captured from the WooCommerce order ?

These below mentioned properties are captured from woocommerce order:
1. Customer id
2. Customer phone
3. Site url
4. Order created date
5. Order fullfilment date
6. Order id
7. Order item quantity
8. Order total amount
9. Order currency
10. Shipping city
11. Shipping country
12. Shipping company
13. Shipping state
14. Shipping method
15. Shipping total
